provider.attributionText: Disclaimer: Always check with the business for pricing and availability of menu items. SinglePlatform is not responsible for menu or pricing changes, but the information is believed to be accurate when posted. Listing of a menu does not mean that there is any affiliation, endorsement or sponsorship between SinglePlatform and the listed business.

items.name: Wine Menu
items.description: Tuesday Night Wine Special: Caldora Montepulciano D"Abruzzo & Ruffino Pinot Grigio Only $5! Happy Hour: Tuesday thru Thursday 4 - 7; Friday 3-8; $1 off all bar drinks; $2 off all appetizers

items.name: Man Vintners Chenin Blanc, Malady South Africa
items.description: Tropical fruit, guava & apple aromas, bold sweet citrus flavors backed by refreshing acidity & minerality

items.name: El Hada, Spain
items.description: A delicious dry white blend from Verdejo & Viura grapes, with vivid flavors of citrus & peach

items.name: Kung Fu Girl Riesling, Washington State
items.description: White stone fruit, white peach & apricot, think fuji apple, shiro plum & lime leaves

items.name: Buehler Chardonnay
items.description: Russian River Valley, California Aromas of fresh honeysuckle & pineapple with hints of white peach

items.name: Ruffino Pinot Grigio, Italy
items.description: Golden apple, honeyed pear & citrus notes, along with a touch of minerality, medium-bodied.

items.name: 14 Hands Moscato, Washington State
items.description: Aromas of rose petal, see lychee & pear with appealing citrus peel undertone

items.name: Twin Islands Sauvignon Blanc, New Zealand
items.description: Pale lemon in color, intense aromas of passion fruit & papaya with some grapefruit & fresh garden herb notes

items.name: Canyon Road White Zinfandel, California
items.description: Light-bodied with hints of strawberry, cherry & watermelon flavors and a smooth, crisp finish

items.name: Underwood Pinot Noir, Oregon
items.description: Exhibits aromas of cranberries & red raspberries with notes of smoke & spice

items.name: Borsao Berola, Spain
items.description: Deep cherry color, remarkably complex bouquet with hints of dark fruit & roasted balsamic notes

items.name: Caldora Montepulciano D"abruzzo, Italy
items.description: Dry, medium to full bodied with dark cherry & plum fruit flavors

items.name: San Fabiano Chianti, Italy
items.description: Bouquet of sweet & sour cherries, saddle leather, herbs & spice, light, fruity & fresh

items.name: Hahn Winery Merlot, Central Coast
items.description: Garnet-ruby in color, this wine automatically recalls black cherry with hints of cocoa & cassis

items.name: Thelema Red Mountain Blend, South Africa
items.description: Spicy aromas of black pepper & mulberry mingle with the plum flavors in this soft & approachable wine

items.name: Don David Malbec Reserve, Argentina
items.description: Aromas of blueberry, boysenberry, charcoal, plenty of oak & hints of cardamom & star anise

items.name: 'R' Collection Cabernet, California
items.description: Full bodied, beautifully balanced with rich flavors

items.name: Stag's Leap Cabernet Sauvignon, Napa Valley, California
items.description: Big and bold with vibrant fruit & great structure

items.name: Gris Blanc Rose, France
items.description: Made from the Grenache Gris grape, pale hue and delicate red fruit aromas

items.description: Bouquet of golden apple, white peach & honeysuckle

items.name: Veuve De Vernay Brut, France
items.description: Crisp and fruity

items.description: Semi-sweet red sparkling wine with a rosy hue & a refreshing finish

items.name: Gruet Blanc De Noirs, New Mexico
items.description: Alive with crisp flavors of green apple, citrus & asian pear

items.name: Louis Roederer, France
items.description: Nuances of ripe pears, smoke, spices, dried flowers & herbs

items.name: Lamberti Prosecco Extra Dry, Italy

items.description: Elegant golden straw color with flavors of yellow peach, plum, pineapple & honey

items.name: Dry Creek Sauvignon Blanc, California
items.description: Zesty & full of energy, aromatics themes of lemongrass & lemon verbena with underlying tropical fruit richness

items.name: Simi Chardonay, California
items.description: Aromas of citrus, spice & toasted oak, flavors of peach, citrus & oak, good balance

items.name: Lageder Pinot Grigio, Italy
items.description: Brilliant straw color with a green shimmer, pronounced & expressive aroma with flowery & somewhat spicy notes

items.description: Berry, vanilla & oak spice flavors with a silky finish

items.name: Alexander Valley Merlot, Sonoma County
items.description: Aromas of black cherry, blackberry, oak,vanilla, plum & the slight eucalyptus typical of Alexander Valley

items.name: Brunch Buffet Menu
items.description: Vegetable Frittata; Both beautiful & delicious this egg dish is a magical mixture of brightly colored vegetables blended with Swiss & cream cheese & delicately seasoned. Served with Grilled Ham, Home-fried Potatoes, Fresh Seasonal Fruit, and an assortment of Fresh Baked Breads & Muffins

items.name: Brunch Includes
items.description: Fresh Squeezed Orange Juice or s House Special Blend Coffee or Soft Drink A Cold Smoked Salmon Platter & Bagels may be ordered to complement your brunch

items.name: Mimosas & Bellinis
items.description: Offered during brunch on Saturdays only

items.name: Hors D'oeuvres
items.description: Serves 20-30 people

items.name: Norwegian Smoked Salmon
items.description: Our tender Salmon has a delicate smoked flavor and is beautifully displayed on a bed of greens surrounded with Philadelphia Cream Cheese, Fresh Slices of Bermuda Onion & Spanish Capers

items.name: Coconut Battered Shrimp
items.description: Our large hand battered shrimp are rolled in a mixture of coconut & bread crumbs and deep fried to a savory golden brown perfection

items.name: Cold Boiled Shrimp
items.description: A bountiful platter of large, succulent gulf shrimp served chilled with a zesty cocktail sauce

items.name: Sesame Encrusted Tuna
items.description: Thinly sliced sushi grade tuna, prepared medium rare on top of cucumber slices with a delectable soy ginger sauce, garnished with a medley of oriental vegetables marinated in sesame vinaigrette

items.name: Salmon Mousse
items.description: A treasure from the sea! Our tasty mousse is velvety smooth with just the right touch of dill, molded into a beautiful fish with cucumber scales and lemon wheel fins

items.name: Tenderloin of Pork
items.description: A mouth-watering delight! Our delectable array of superb tenderloin accompanied by a spicy pineapple & green onion relish makes this a tantalizing dish. This one is a must for any occasion

items.name: Choice French Brie & Seasoned Roasted Garlic
items.description: Rich slices of our creamy Brie are accompanied by our Colossal Garlic cloves which are dipped in seasoned olive oil, roasted to a tender perfection & served with an array of fresh fruit

items.name: Authentic Deli Platter
items.description: The meat lover's dream! This delicious combination of Smoked Turkey, Honey Glazed Ham & Cajun Roast Beef is served with gourmet mustard and mayonnaise and freshly baked bread

items.name: Imported Cheese Board
items.description: A delightful combination of our flavorful cheeses including Smoked Gouda, Herbed Havarti, Jarlsberg & Pepper Jack, served with fresh fruit

items.name: Hors D'oeuvre Assortment
items.description: This delightful trio consists of Fillo Shells, with an unforgettable combination of spinach, zesty feta cheese, sun-dried tomato, pine nuts & tantalizing spices; Fillo Shells with a delicious mixture of shrimp & boursin cheese; and Artichoke Hearts with a touch of goat cheese dipped in a mixture of parmesan cheese & seasoned bread crumbs

items.name: Chicken & Queso in Fillo
items.description: Bite sized flaky fillo shells with smoked chicken, creamy queso, green chiles & green onion, baked until warm and crispy

items.name: Fiesta Tortilla Wraps
items.description: A tantalizing combination of flavored tortillas filled with a mixture of black beans, roasted red bell peppers, & cilantro, a blend of cream cheese, sun-dried tomatoes, greek olives & spices, and a blend of spicy roasted tomatilla & cream cheese, sliced into pinwheels, accompanied by our zesty salsa

items.name: Artichoke & Spinach Dip
items.description: A delicious combination of artichoke hearts & fresh spinach, blended with Parmesan, Swiss & Provolone cheese, served with tortilla chips

items.name: Chile Con Queso
items.description: Prepared Tex-Mex Style our zesty queso is accompanied with our fresh homemade salsa served with jalapenos & tortilla chips

items.name: Chicken Salad On Roma Tomatoes
items.description: Baba Yega's homemade roasted chicken salad on plump, garden fresh roma tomato slices served with freshly baked bread

items.name: Chicken Satay
items.description: Chicken breast skewers, marinated in an Indonesian soy sauce, grilled to perfection served with a flavorful blend of coconut-peanut sauce garnished with grilled seasonal fruit

items.name: Spicy Chicken Tenders
items.description: Marinated chicken breast, lightly seasoned & breaded, dipped in our homemade batter & deep fried, served with a tangy honey mustard sauce

items.name: Seasonal Fresh Fruits
items.description: A light & refreshing beginning for any event. A kaleidoscope of tropical and native fruits beautifully displayed

items.name: Grilled Vegetable Platter
items.description: A cornucopia of perfectly grilled garden vegetables, such as zucchini, yellow squash, carrots, mushrooms, asparagus & red bell pepper served with a homemade creamy herb sauce

items.name: Pasta Salad
items.description: A generous mixture of pasta, capers, artichoke hearts, broccoli, & cherry tomatoes, tossed in our homemade basil vinaigrette

items.name: Tomatoes Caprese
items.description: A colorful platter of beautifully arranged plump roma tomatoes, fresh mozzarella cheese & our flavorful basil dressing served with freshly baked bread

items.name: Mediterranean Sampler
items.description: Fresh Tabouli Salad, Tasty Hummus and Zesty Baba Ghanouj, decorated with tasty Kalamata olives & spicy Pepperoncini peppers served with slices of whole-wheat pita bread. Healthy & Delicious!

items.name: Mushrooms Florentine Or Italian Stuffed Mushrooms
items.description: Large mushroom caps generously filled with either a delicate blend of spinach, saut√©ed onions, garlic, & jalapenos or fresh herb stuffing & Italian sausage topped with parmesan cheese

items.name: Baba Yega Cakes & Desserts!
items.description: We pride ourselves on fresh quality desserts made in-house daily. Our dessert tray changes regularly so make sure and ask your server to see the dessert menu. Our express lunch buffet include great desserts too. We also regularly offer some vegan dessert treats. Don't miss out on Houston's favorite desserts!

items.name: Baba Yega Signature Cakes
items.description: Our cakes may be ordered for in-house events or for pickup for your own private events!

items.name: Carrot Cake
items.description: A wonderfully moist cake baked with fresh carrots, pineapple, coconut, and walnuts, frosted with our homemade cream cheese icing

items.name: Three Layer Chocolate Mousse Cake
items.description: A moist chocolate fudge cake topped with a layer of fluffy sweetened cream cheese and finished with a decadent chocolate mousse

items.name: White Cake
items.description: A light white cake with fresh sliced strawberries nestled between the layers, frosted with a luscious whipped cream icing

items.name: Red Velvet Cake
items.description: Super moist, melt in your mouth, traditional red velvet light chocolate cake frosted with silky smooth cream cheese icing

items.name: Luscious Lemon Cake
items.description: With a slightly tart lemon curd between the layers, frosted with heavenly lemon whipped cream icing

items.name: French Vanilla Cake
items.description: A light, moist vanilla cake frosted with French vanilla butter cream icing

items.name: Strawberry Cake
items.description: A favorite for kids, moist cake blended with strawberries, frosted with strawberry cream cheese icing

items.name: Tres Leches (in-House Only)
items.description: An exceptionally moist cake made with three milks, flavored with rum, topped with whipped cream icing, $10 additional charge each size required for Tres Leches

items.name: Cheesecakes
items.description: Strawberry, chocolate, chocolate chip, praline, cappucino, almond joy, etc

items.name: Peanut Butter Pie
items.description: An oreo cookie crust topped with a heavenly whipped cream & peanut butter combination enhanced by a chocolate ganache topping

items.name: Lime Chiffon Pie
items.description: A buttery graham cracker crust filled with creamy chiffon, bursting with the flavor of freshly squeezed lime juice

items.name: Low Sugar Sacher Torte
items.description: A dense chocolate cake filled with a rich apricot filling topped with chocolate ganache icing

provider.name: singleplatform
provider.attributionText: Disclaimer: Always check with the business for pricing and availability of menu items. SinglePlatform is not responsible for menu or pricing changes, but the information is believed to be accurate when posted. Listing of a menu does not mean that there is any affiliation, endorsement or sponsorship between SinglePlatform and the listed business.

items.name: Tendercrisp Garden Salad
items.description: Season-ripe lettuce, carrots, and tomatoes topped with crispy chicken, three kinds of cheese, and your choice of ken's salad dressing. tendercrisp is the salad for chicken-lovers.

items.name: Garden Salad
items.description: Man doesnt live on flame-broiled burgers alone. try the bk garden salad as a satisfying accompaniment to any meal. or as a meal in itself. croutons are included in nutritional information. price and participation may vary. prices higher in ak & hi.

items.name: Tendergrilltm Garden Salad
items.description: Season-ripe lettuce, carrots, and tomatoes topped with grilled chicken, three kinds of cheese, and your choice of ken's salad dressing. tendergrillTM is the salad for grilled-chicken lovers.

items.name: Whopper
items.description: A 14 pound of flame-broiled beef, ripe tomatoes, crisp lettuce, creamy mayo, ketchup, crunchy pickles and onions on a toasted sesame seed bun. its americas favorite burger. the original. the whopper. based on pre-cooked patty weight. based on preference.

items.name: Double Whopper
items.description: Two flame-broiled beef patties stacked high with red ripe tomatoes, crisp lettuce, creamy mayo, ketchup, crunchy pickles, and onions all on a toasted sesame seed bun. double the whopper patties, double the satisfaction.

items.name: Triple Whopper
items.description: Three flame-broiled beef patties with two slices of american cheese, crisp lettuce, creamy mayo, red ripe tomatoes, pickles and onionsall on a toasted sesame seed bun. its once, twice, three times the tasty, and its waiting for you at burger king

items.name: Whopper Jr.
items.description: Its a little whopper sandwich with a big taste. a flame-broiled beef patty topped with red ripe tomatoes, crisp lettuce, creamy mayo, ketchup, crunchy pickles, and onions-all on a toasted sesame seed bun.

items.name: Bk Single Stacker
items.description: Behold 1 patty, 1 slice of cheese & 2 half slices of bacon smothered in bk stacker sauce. this flame-broiled starter stacker is a most formidable crave-crusher.

items.name: Bk Double Stacker
items.description: Step up to 2 patties, 1 slice of cheese & 2 half slices of bacon smothered in bk stacker sauce. the second story of meaty, cheesy, bacony deliciousness ensures massive hunger destruction.

items.name: Bk Triple Stacker
items.description: This mountainous monument of meat boasts 3 patties, 2 slices of cheese & 2 half slices of bacon all smothered in bk stacker sauce. this shrine of meaty cheesy, goodness is sure to satisfy even the most discerning of meatatarians.

items.name: Hamburger
items.description: Start with a flame-broiled beef patty, add crunchy pickles.  finish with yellow mustard and ketchup on a sesame seed bun. perfect if youre not into cheese, or if you just have a taste for the understated.  whatever the reason, have it your way.

items.name: Double Hamburger
items.description: Two flame-broiled patties, crunchy pickles, red ketchup, yellow mustard  put it all together, and you've got our double hamburger.

items.name: Cheeseburger
items.description: The good ol burger king cheeseburger. crunchy pickles, red ketchup, yellow mustard, and fittingly, cheese  all on a sesame seed bun. you cant go wrong when you have it your way

items.name: Double Cheeseburger
items.description: What comes with a 1/4 lb double cheeseburger? two beef patties, two slices of melted cheese, crunchy pickles, delicious ketchup and mustard, and the flame-fresh taste your stomach craves. based on pre-cooked patty weight

items.name: Mushroom & Swiss Burger
items.description: 3.2 ounces of fire-grilled, seasoned beef topped with sauteed mushrooms, swiss cheese, and our original grill sauce. limited time only. at participating restaurants.

items.name: Western Bbq Cheeseburger
items.description: 3.2 ounces of fire-grilled, seasoned beef topped with onion rings, american cheese, and tangy bbq sauce. limited time only. at participating restaurants.

items.name: Deluxe Cheeseburger
items.description: The deluxe cheeseburger is a 3.2 ounce of fire-grilled, seasoned beef topped with american cheese, lettuce, onions, pickles, and thousand island sauce. limited time only. at participating restaurants.

items.name: Bk Chefs Choice Burger
items.description: A flame-broiled 5.5 oz burger patty, made with usda certified ground chuck seasoned with salt and pepper, a thick slice american cheese, naturally-smoked thick cut bacon, fresh cut romaine lettuce, red onions and ripe tomatoes, our original grill sauce on an artisan bun. at participating restaurants.

items.name: Bacon & Cheddar Bk Toppers Burger
items.description: 3.2 ounces of fire-grilled beef, topped with melted cheddar cheese, thick-cut hardwood smoked bacon, mayonnaise, ketchup, and crispy pickles all on a warm, toasted bun.

items.name: Tendergrill Chicken Sandwich
items.description: You want chicken? you got it. you want a juicy grilled chicken filet on ciabatta bread, topped with crisp lettuce and tomato? you got that, too. its called the tendergrill chicken sandwich.

items.name: Tendercrisp Chicken Sandwich On Artisan Bun
items.description: Crispy on the outside, tender on the insidethe tendercrisp chicken sandwich is a premium white meat chicken filet with crisp breading, fresh lettuce, red ripe tomatoes, and mayo on a corn-dusted bun. it's chicken just the way you want it.

items.name: Spicy Chickn Crisp Sandwich
items.description: A crispy chicken patty topped with garden-fresh iceberg lettuce and creamy mayo, all sandwiched in a fresh sesame seed bun. its got just the right amount of spicy kick. and at $1*, its also got just the right amount of price.  price and participation may vary. prices higher in ak & hi.

items.name: Original Chicken Sandwich
items.description: Crispy premium white meat chicken topped with shredded lettuce, mayo, and served on a sesame seed bun. so good, we haven't changed it since 1979. how many sandwiches can say that?

items.name: Club Chicken Sandwich
items.description: Crispy premium white meat chicken topped with thick-cut bacon, tomato, shredded lettuce, mayo, and served on a sesame seed bun. a great new twist added to an all-time favorite.

items.name: Italian Chicken Sandwich
items.description: Crispy premium white meat chicken topped with flavorful marinara sauce, mozzarella cheese and served on a sesame seed bun. a delicious new flavor added to an all-time favorite.

items.name: Chicken Tenders
items.description: Four pieces, eight pieces, twenty pieces. but don't let that limit you. if you want 24 of the new, crispy chicken tenders, just order a twenty and a four. thirty-two? order a twenty, a four and an eight. what's that you ask? you want an odd number of chicken tenders? easy. order any amount, take one

items.name: Bk Veggie Burger
items.description: A morningstar farms garden veggie patty, garden crisp vegetables, whole grains, and spicesall topped with lettuce, red ripe tomatoes, ketchup, creamy mayo, and served on a sesame seed bun. if there's one thing we know, it's burgers. even veggie burgers. no, especially, the bk veggie burger.

items.name: Bk Big Fish
items.description: A crisp, golden breaded 4.3-ounce filet, tangy tartar sauce, and fresh lettuce all served on a corn-dusted bun. the bk big fish commands attention, and delivers satisfaction. who are you to resist? based on pre-cooked filet weight.

items.name: French Fries - Salted (Medium)
items.description: Enjoy golden brown, piping hot, crispy and tasty french fries with your favorite bk  value meal, or devour them as a side. dip them in ketchup, barbeque sauce, your shake, or nothing at all. we won't judge. just have it your way.

items.name: Onion Rings (Medium)
items.description: Served hot and crispy, onion rings are the perfect round, tasty treat for plunging into zesty dipping sauce. or maybe you prefer barbeque sauce? or honey mustard? just have it your way.

items.name: Garden Salad
items.description: Man doesnt live on flame-broiled burgers alone. try the bk  garden salad as a satisfying accompaniment to any meal. or as a meal in itself. croutons are included in nutritional information. * price and participation may vary. prices higher in ak & hi.

items.name: Dutch Apple Pie
items.description: Hot and gooey apple filling in a flaky baked crust. and on top of that, it's dutch. so you know it's delicious.

items.name: Hershey's Sundae Pie
items.description: Take a crunchy chocolate crust, add in chocolate filling, then take a crunchy chocolate crust, add in chocolate filling, then top it off with whipped cream and hersheys chocolate chips. chocolate lovers: give a warm welcome to the hersheys sundae pie. the hersheys trademark and trade dress are used under license by burger king corporation.

items.name: Oreo Sundae
items.description: Cool and creamy vanilla soft serve is layered between chocolate fudge and topped with oreo cookie pieces. at participating restaurants.

items.name: Oreo Brownie Sundae
items.description: A chocolate oreo brownie is topped with cool and creamy vanilla soft serve and chocolate fudge. at participating restaurants.

items.name: Peach and Granola Sundae
items.description: Cool and creamy vanilla soft serve is layered between sweet peach toppings and topped with crunchy granola. at participating restaurants.

items.name: Strawberry Hand Spun Shake
items.description: Cool and creamy strawberry shakes are hand spun and topped with whipped topping. at participating restaurants.
